name: Fisherman Adventures
description:
Click to build a boat for your survival on the ocean.

How to survive on raft:
- Collect as many as possible wood, arks, leaves, and any floating objects on the sea to earn coins and build your raft.
- Upgrade your raft to build your own island.

Features:
- Impressive and eye-catching art style.
- Single-handed game.
- Fast upgrade progression, amazing island with diversified materials.
publishers: BAP INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY AND IMPORT EXPORTS COMPANY
